entry.data:
CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
